title: The Secret of Not Falling in Love
overview: Su Yi loses memories after the accident. In the process of finding the truth, she hides her identity and meets Li Jia Cheng, who has many connections to the incident.Li Jia Cheng is considered a steely man with a cold character, born into a family that values money and power. His fate was predetermined from birth, he worked the goal and became the successor to the group Lee.At first, these two feud, but gradually get closer. Su Yi challenges Li Jia Cheng's worldview and beliefs and allows him to overcome all obstacles on the way to true love.
